segments.text: I'm terrified seeing that stool tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's reaching so far into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One slip and he'll crash down hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's wet from the sink overflowâ€”double danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman's right there but not paying attention at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her puddle's growing, she could fall too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's close by; she might get hurt if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, everything's calm, but inside it's a hazard zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down like it's unstoppable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool holds, but it looks bad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids shouldn't climb like that without help.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom's so absorbed; this is scary.
segments.speaker: PAR
